content: materials to make one washcloth hand towel you ll need… - 1 3 skein s of purl soho s cotton pure 1 100% organically grown cotton each skein is 279 yards/ 100 grams approximately 85 650 yards required we used the colors heirloom white and alabaster cream for our washcloths and shiso green and lemon mint for our hand towels - us 3 3 25 mm straight or 24-inch circular needles 2 - if using straight needles two us 3 3 25 mm double pointed needles 3 for i-cord note 3 skeins is enough yarn to make 2 washcloths and 1 hand towel gauge 20 stitches and 48 row = 4 inches in stitch pattern sizes washcloth hand towel finished dimensions 7 inches wide x 9 inches long 18 inches wide x 30 inches long designed by purl soho designer gianna mueller 4 click here 5 to see even more of gianna s designs 1 https //www purlsoho com/cotton-pure html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796_23802 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23799 4 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/gianna-mueller-for-purl-soho/ 5 https //www instagram com/giannaknits/
